religion_convert_effect_everything = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_excommunicated = yes
			}
			excommunicate = ROOT
		}

###############################################################################################
###############################################################################################
################################################## catholic Part ############################
###############################################################################################
###############################################################################################

##################################################
######### catholic --> Protestant 
##################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = protestant
				has_idea_group = catholic0
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic1 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = protestant0
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = protestant
				has_idea = catholic1
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic2 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = protestant0
			add_idea = protestant1
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = protestant
				has_idea = catholic2
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic3 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = protestant0
			add_idea = protestant1
			add_idea = protestant2
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = protestant
				has_idea = catholic3
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic4 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = protestant0
			add_idea = protestant1
			add_idea = protestant2
			add_idea = protestant3
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = protestant
				has_idea = catholic4
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic5 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = protestant0
			add_idea = protestant1
			add_idea = protestant2
			add_idea = protestant3
			add_idea = protestant4
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = protestant
				has_idea = catholic5
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic6 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = protestant0
			add_idea = protestant1
			add_idea = protestant2
			add_idea = protestant3
			add_idea = protestant4
			add_idea = protestant5
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = protestant
				has_idea = catholic6
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic7 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = protestant0
			add_idea = protestant1
			add_idea = protestant2
			add_idea = protestant3
			add_idea = protestant4
			add_idea = protestant5
			add_idea = protestant6
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = protestant
				has_idea = catholic7
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = protestant0
			add_idea = protestant1
			add_idea = protestant2
			add_idea = protestant3
			add_idea = protestant4
			add_idea = protestant5
			add_idea = protestant6
			add_idea = protestant7
		}


##################################################
######### catholic --> reformed
##################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = reformed
				has_idea_group = catholic0
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic1 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = reformed0
		}

				NOT = { has_idea = catholic2 }
			}

		}

			}

			add_idea = reformed1
			add_idea = reformed2
		}
		
		if = {

				religion = reformed
				has_idea = catholic3
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic4 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = reformed0
			add_idea = reformed1
			add_idea = reformed2
			add_idea = reformed3
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = reformed
				has_idea = catholic4
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic5 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = reformed0
			add_idea = reformed1
			add_idea = reformed2
			add_idea = reformed3
			add_idea = reformed4
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = reformed
				has_idea = catholic5
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic6 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = reformed0
			add_idea = reformed1
			add_idea = reformed2
			add_idea = reformed3
			add_idea = reformed4
			add_idea = reformed5
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = reformed
				has_idea = catholic6
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic7 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = reformed0
			add_idea = reformed1
			add_idea = reformed2
			add_idea = reformed3
			add_idea = reformed4
			add_idea = reformed5
			add_idea = reformed6
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = reformed
				has_idea = catholic7
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = reformed0
			add_idea = reformed1
			add_idea = reformed2
			add_idea = reformed3
			add_idea = reformed4
			add_idea = reformed5
			add_idea = reformed6
			add_idea = reformed7
		}

		
##################################################
######### catholic --> Anglican
##################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = anglican
				has_idea_group = catholic0
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic1 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = anglican0
		}

				religion = anglican
				has_idea = catholic1
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic2 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = anglican0
			add_idea = anglican1
		}
		
		if = {

				religion = anglican

			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0

		}

		}

				religion = anglican
				has_idea = catholic4
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic5 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = anglican0
			add_idea = anglican1
			add_idea = anglican2
			add_idea = anglican3
			add_idea = anglican4
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = anglican
				has_idea = catholic5
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic6 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = anglican0
			add_idea = anglican1
			add_idea = anglican2
			add_idea = anglican3
			add_idea = anglican4
			add_idea = anglican5
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = anglican
				has_idea = catholic6
				NOT = { has_idea = catholic7 }
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = anglican0
			add_idea = anglican1
			add_idea = anglican2
			add_idea = anglican3
			add_idea = anglican4
			add_idea = anglican5
			add_idea = anglican6
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = anglican
				has_idea = catholic7
			}
			remove_idea_group = catholic0
			add_idea_group = anglican0
			add_idea = anglican1
			add_idea = anglican2
			add_idea = anglican3
			add_idea = anglican4
			add_idea = anglican5
			add_idea = anglican6
			add_idea = anglican7
		}

##################################################
######### catholic --> Orthodox
##################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				religion = orthodox
				has_idea_group = catholic0

			}

		}

######### catholic --> Islam
##################################################

		}

		NOT = { has_idea = catholic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0

		add_idea = sunni1
		}

		religion = sunni

		}

##################################################
######### catholic --> Tengri
##################################################

		if = {

##################################################
######### catholic --> Confucianism
##################################################

		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = catholic7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		add_idea = confucian7
		}

##################################################
######### catholic --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = catholic0
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana

		}

		
##################################################
######### catholic --> Jewish
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea_group = catholic0
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = catholic1
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = catholic2
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = catholic3
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = catholic4
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = catholic5
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		add_idea = jewish5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = catholic6
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		add_idea = jewish5
		add_idea = jewish6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = catholic7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		add_idea = jewish5
		add_idea = jewish6
		add_idea = jewish7
		}


##################################################
######### catholic --> Slav
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea_group = catholic0
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = catholic1
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = catholic2
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = catholic3
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = catholic4
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = catholic5
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		add_idea = slavic5
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = catholic6
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		add_idea = slavic5
		add_idea = slavic6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = catholic7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		add_idea = slavic5
		add_idea = slavic6
		add_idea = slavic7
		}

##################################################
######### catholic --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = catholic0
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = catholic1
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism

		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0

		add_idea = fetishist1

		add_idea = fetishist1

		}

######### catholic --> Nahuatl

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea_group = catholic0
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = catholic1
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = catholic2
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = catholic3
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		add_idea = nahuatl3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = catholic4
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		add_idea = nahuatl3
		add_idea = nahuatl4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = catholic5
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		add_idea = nahuatl3
		add_idea = nahuatl4
		add_idea = nahuatl5
		}

		religion = nahuatl

		NOT = { has_idea = catholic7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		add_idea = nahuatl3
		add_idea = nahuatl4
		add_idea = nahuatl5
		add_idea = nahuatl6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = catholic7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		add_idea = nahuatl3
		add_idea = nahuatl4
		add_idea = nahuatl5
		add_idea = nahuatl6
		add_idea = nahuatl7
		}


		
##################################################
######### catholic --> Mesoamerican
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea_group = catholic0
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = catholic1
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = catholic2
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = catholic3
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = catholic4
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = catholic5
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = catholic6
		NOT = { has_idea = catholic7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		add_idea = mesoamerican6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = catholic7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		add_idea = mesoamerican6
		add_idea = mesoamerican7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = protestant0
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = protestant1
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = protestant2
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = protestant3
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = protestant4
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		add_idea = catholic4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = protestant5
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		add_idea = catholic4
		add_idea = catholic5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = protestant6
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		add_idea = catholic4
		add_idea = catholic5
		add_idea = catholic6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {

		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = protestant7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		add_idea = confucian7
		}

		add_idea = suomi6
		add_idea = suomi7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Jewish
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea_group = protestant0
		NOT = { has_idea = protestant1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = protestant0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {

		NOT = { has_idea = protestant2 }

		}

		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		add_idea = jewish5
		}

		if = {

		add_idea = zoroastrian7

######### Protestant --> Nahuatl

		if = {

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = reformed0
		NOT = { has_idea = reformed1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = reformed0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		}

		add_idea = catholic6
		}

		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = reformed6
		NOT = { has_idea = reformed7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = reformed0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = reformed7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = reformed0
		add_idea_group = confucian0

		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		add_idea = confucian7
		}

######### Protestant --> Buddhism

		}

		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3
		add_idea = suomi4
		add_idea = suomi5
		add_idea = suomi6
		add_idea = suomi7
		}

		if = {

		has_idea_group = reformed0
		NOT = { has_idea = reformed1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = jewish0
		}

		add_idea = zoroastrian5
		add_idea = zoroastrian6
		add_idea = zoroastrian7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic
##################################################

		if = {

		NOT = { has_idea = orthodox1 }
		}

		remove_idea_group = orthodox0

		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		add_idea = catholic4
		add_idea = catholic5
		add_idea = catholic6
		}

		has_idea = orthodox7

		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = orthodox6
		NOT = { has_idea = orthodox7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4

		}

			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea = orthodox7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3
		add_idea = suomi4
		add_idea = suomi5
		add_idea = suomi6
		add_idea = suomi7
		}

		if = {

		add_idea = zoroastrian1
		add_idea = zoroastrian2
		add_idea = zoroastrian3
		add_idea = zoroastrian4
		add_idea = zoroastrian5
		add_idea = zoroastrian6
		add_idea = zoroastrian7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = sunni0
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic

		NOT = { has_idea = sunni2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		}

		limit = {

		NOT = { has_idea = sunni3 }
		}

		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic

		NOT = { has_idea = sunni4 }

		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		}

		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = sunni4

		}

		add_idea = catholic1

		add_idea = catholic3

		limit = {

		has_idea = sunni5

		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		add_idea = catholic4
		add_idea = catholic5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = sunni6
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		add_idea = catholic4
		add_idea = catholic5
		add_idea = catholic6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {

		has_idea = sunni7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = catholic0

		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		add_idea = catholic4
		add_idea = catholic5
		add_idea = catholic6

		}

		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = sunni4
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism

		add_idea = confucian5
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = sunni7 }

		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		}

		limit = {

		add_idea = confucian5

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = sunni0
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = sunni1
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = sunni2
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = sunni3
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = sunni4
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = sunni5
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni6 }

		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2

		add_idea = buddhism4

		NOT = { has_idea = sunni7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6

			}
		has_idea = sunni7
		
		}

		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2

		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		add_idea = buddhism7

		add_idea_group = norse0
		}

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea = sunni5
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3
		add_idea = suomi4
		add_idea = suomi5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea = sunni6
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3
		add_idea = suomi4
		add_idea = suomi5
		add_idea = suomi6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea = sunni7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3
		add_idea = suomi4
		add_idea = suomi5
		add_idea = suomi6
		add_idea = suomi7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Jewish
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea_group = sunni0
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = sunni1
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = sunni2
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = sunni3
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = sunni4
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = sunni5
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		add_idea = jewish5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = sunni6
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		add_idea = jewish5
		add_idea = jewish6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = sunni7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		add_idea = jewish5
		add_idea = jewish6
		add_idea = jewish7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Slav
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea_group = sunni0
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = sunni1
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = sunni2
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = sunni3
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = sunni4
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = sunni5
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		add_idea = slavic5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = sunni6
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		add_idea = slavic5
		add_idea = slavic6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = sunni7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2

		add_idea = slavic7

		if = {

			religion_group = hellenic

		NOT = { has_idea = sunni1 }
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Manechism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea_group = sunni0
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = manichean0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = sunni1
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea = manichean1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean

		}
		has_idea = sunni2
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0

		add_idea = manichean1
		add_idea = manichean2
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = sunni0
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = sunni1
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = sunni2
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = sunni3
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = sunni4
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = sunni5
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = sunni6
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		add_idea = fetishist6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = sunni7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		add_idea = fetishist6
		add_idea = fetishist7
		}

		add_idea = zoroastrian2
		add_idea = zoroastrian3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = sunni4
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea = zoroastrian1
		add_idea = zoroastrian2
		add_idea = zoroastrian3
		add_idea = zoroastrian4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = sunni5
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni6 }

		add_idea = zoroastrian5

		NOT = { has_idea = sunni7 }

		add_idea = zoroastrian3
		add_idea = zoroastrian4

		add_idea = zoroastrian6

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Mesoamerican
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea_group = sunni0
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = sunni1
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = sunni2
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = sunni3
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = sunni4
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = sunni5
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = sunni6
		NOT = { has_idea = sunni7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		add_idea = mesoamerican6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = sunni7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = tengri0
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = tengri1
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = tengri2
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = tengri3
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = tengri4
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		add_idea = catholic4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = tengri5
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		add_idea = catholic4
		add_idea = catholic5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = tengri6
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		add_idea = catholic4
		add_idea = catholic5
		add_idea = catholic6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = tengri7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		add_idea = catholic3
		add_idea = catholic4
		add_idea = catholic5
		add_idea = catholic6
		add_idea = catholic7
		}

######### Protestant --> Protestant

		if = {

		add_idea = protestant5
		add_idea = protestant6
		}

		add_idea = protestant5
		add_idea = protestant6

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Hindu
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea_group = tengri0
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = tengri1
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = tengri2
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = tengri3
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		}

		limit = {

		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = tengri6
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = tengri7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		add_idea = hindu7
		}

		if = {

		}

######### Protestant --> Buddhism

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = tengri0
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana

		NOT = { has_idea = tengri2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}

		OR = {

##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea_group = tengri0
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea = tengri1
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea = tengri2
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea = tengri3
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea = tengri4
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3
		add_idea = suomi4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea = tengri5
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3
		add_idea = suomi4
		add_idea = suomi5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea = tengri6
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3
		add_idea = suomi4
		add_idea = suomi5
		add_idea = suomi6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {	
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
			religion = suomenusko
			}
		has_idea = tengri7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3
		add_idea = suomi4
		add_idea = suomi5
		add_idea = suomi6
		add_idea = suomi7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Jewish
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea_group = tengri0
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = tengri1
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = tengri2
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = tengri3
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = tengri4
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = tengri5
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		add_idea = jewish5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = tengri6
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		add_idea = jewish5
		add_idea = jewish6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = tengri7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		add_idea = jewish5
		add_idea = jewish6
		add_idea = jewish7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Slav
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea_group = tengri0
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = tengri1
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = tengri2
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = tengri3
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = tengri4
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = tengri5
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		add_idea = slavic5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = tengri6
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		add_idea = slavic5
		add_idea = slavic6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = tengri7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = tengri0
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = tengri1
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = tengri3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = tengri3
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = tengri5 }

		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4

		OR = {
			religion = shamanism

		NOT = { has_idea = tengri6 }

		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = tengri6
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		add_idea = fetishist6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = tengri7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		add_idea = fetishist6
		add_idea = fetishist7
		}

		add_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea = hussite1
		add_idea = hussite2
		add_idea = hussite3
		}

		has_idea = tengri4
		NOT = { has_idea = tengri5 }
		}

		add_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea = hussite1

		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = hindu2
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = hindu3
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = hindu4
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = hindu5
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = hindu6
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = hindu7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		add_idea = hindu7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Confucianism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea_group = hindu0
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = hindu1
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = hindu2

		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		}

		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		add_idea = confucian7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = hindu0
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hindu1
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hindu2
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hindu3
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hindu4
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hindu5
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hindu6
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hindu7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		add_idea = buddhism7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Nordisch
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea_group = hindu0
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = hindu1
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = hindu2
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		}

		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = hindu3
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = hindu4
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = hindu5
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = hindu6
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = hindu7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		add_idea = norse7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Romuva
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea_group = hindu0
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		}

		OR = {

			}

		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = hindu6
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu7 }
		}

		add_idea = romuva3

		}
		has_idea = hindu5
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = hindu6
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		add_idea = fetishist6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = hindu7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		add_idea = fetishist6
		add_idea = fetishist7
		}

		has_idea = hindu3
		NOT = { has_idea = hindu4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea = hussite1
		add_idea = hussite2
		add_idea = hussite3
		}

		add_idea = hussite5

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = confucian0
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = confucian1
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = confucian3 }
		}

		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		}

		add_idea = catholic3

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea_group = confucian0
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = confucian1
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = confucian2
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = confucian3
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = confucian4
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = confucian5
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = confucian6
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = confucian7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		add_idea = hindu7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Confucianism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea_group = confucian0
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = confucian1
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = confucian2
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = confucian3
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = confucian4
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = confucian5
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = confucian6
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = confucian7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		add_idea = confucian7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = confucian0
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = confucian1
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = confucian2
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = confucian3
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = confucian4
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = confucian5
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = confucian6
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = confucian7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		add_idea = buddhism7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Nordisch
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea_group = confucian0
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = confucian1
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = confucian2
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = confucian3
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = confucian4
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = confucian5
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = confucian6
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = confucian7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		add_idea = norse7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Shinto
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea_group = confucian0
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = confucian1
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = confucian2
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		add_idea = shinto2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = confucian3
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		add_idea = shinto2
		add_idea = shinto3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = confucian4
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		add_idea = shinto2
		add_idea = shinto3
		add_idea = shinto4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = confucian5
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		add_idea = shinto2
		add_idea = shinto3
		add_idea = shinto4
		add_idea = shinto5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = confucian6
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		add_idea = shinto2
		add_idea = shinto3
		add_idea = shinto4
		add_idea = shinto5
		add_idea = shinto6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = confucian7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		add_idea = shinto2
		add_idea = shinto3
		add_idea = shinto4
		add_idea = shinto5
		add_idea = shinto6
		add_idea = shinto7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Cathar
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = cathar
		has_idea_group = confucian0
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = cathar
		has_idea = confucian1
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = cathar
		has_idea = confucian2
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = cathar
		has_idea = confucian3
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = cathar
		has_idea = confucian4
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		add_idea = cathar4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = cathar
		has_idea = confucian5
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		add_idea = cathar4
		add_idea = cathar5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = cathar
		has_idea = confucian6
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		add_idea = cathar4
		add_idea = cathar5
		add_idea = cathar6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = cathar
		has_idea = confucian7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		add_idea = cathar4
		add_idea = cathar5
		add_idea = cathar6
		add_idea = cathar7
		}

		add_idea = coptic6
