##################################################
######### Protestant --> Romuva
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea_group = confucian0
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = confucian1
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = confucian2
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = confucian3
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = confucian4
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian5 }
		}

		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = confucian0
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = confucian1
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan

		has_idea = confucian2
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian3 }
		}

		add_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea = ibadi1
		add_idea = ibadi2
		add_idea = ibadi3
		add_idea = ibadi4
		add_idea = ibadi5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = ibadi
		has_idea = confucian6
		NOT = { has_idea = confucian7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea = ibadi1
		add_idea = ibadi2
		add_idea = ibadi3
		add_idea = ibadi4
		add_idea = ibadi5
		add_idea = ibadi6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = ibadi
		has_idea = confucian7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea = ibadi1
		add_idea = ibadi2
		add_idea = ibadi3
		add_idea = ibadi4
		add_idea = ibadi5
		add_idea = ibadi6
		add_idea = ibadi7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = buddhism0
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism2 }
		}

		}

		}

		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = buddhism4
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = buddhism5
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism6 }

		add_idea = tengri5

		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		add_idea = tengri6
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Hindu
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea_group = buddhism0
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = buddhism1
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = buddhism2
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		}

		religion_group  = dharmic

		add_idea = hindu3
		}

		religion_group  = dharmic

		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism5 }
		}

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = buddhism5
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = buddhism6
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		}

		limit = {

		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0

		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		add_idea = hindu7

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = buddhism0
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = buddhism1
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = buddhism2
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		}

		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = buddhism4
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = buddhism5
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = buddhism6
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		}

		OR = {

			}

		}

		add_idea = buddhism6

		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		add_idea = coptic6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = coptic
		has_idea = buddhism7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		add_idea = coptic6
		add_idea = coptic7
		}

		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		}

		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = buddhism5
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3

######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = buddhism0
		NOT = { has_idea = buddhism1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}

		add_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea = shia1
		add_idea = shia2
		add_idea = shia3
		add_idea = shia4
		add_idea = shia5
		add_idea = shia6
		add_idea = shia7
		}

		add_idea = sunni5
		add_idea = sunni6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea = norse7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		add_idea = sunni3
		add_idea = sunni4
		add_idea = sunni5
		add_idea = sunni6
		add_idea = sunni7
		}

		}

		has_idea_group = norse0

		}
		remove_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic

		NOT = { has_idea = norse2 }

		NOT = { has_idea = norse1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}

		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}

		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = coptic
		has_idea = norse4
		NOT = { has_idea = norse5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		}

		limit = {
		religion  = coptic
		has_idea = norse5
		NOT = { has_idea = norse6 }

		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = norse7 }

		add_idea = coptic2

		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		add_idea = coptic6
		}

		add_idea = coptic5

		add_idea = coptic7

		remove_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		}

		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = norse3
		NOT = { has_idea = norse4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = norse0
		NOT = { has_idea = norse1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = norse1
		NOT = { has_idea = norse2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism

		}
		remove_idea_group = norse0

		}

		add_idea = fetishist1

		}

			religion = shamanism

		NOT = { has_idea = norse5 }
		}

		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		}

			religion = shamanism

		add_idea = shia4
		add_idea = shia5
		add_idea = shia6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = shiite
		has_idea = norse7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea = shia1
		add_idea = shia2
		add_idea = shia3
		add_idea = shia4
		add_idea = shia5
		add_idea = shia6
		add_idea = shia7
		}

		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		add_idea = sunni3
		add_idea = sunni4
		add_idea = sunni5
		add_idea = sunni6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea = shinto7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		add_idea = sunni3
		add_idea = sunni4
		add_idea = sunni5
		add_idea = sunni6
		add_idea = sunni7
		}

		limit = {

		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = tengri0
		}

		limit = {

		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Hindu
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = shinto1
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = shinto2
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		}

		religion_group  = dharmic

		NOT = { has_idea = shinto5 }
		}

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic

		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic

		NOT = { has_idea = shinto7 }
		}

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		}

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}

		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}

		OR = {
			religion = buddhism

			religion = mahayana

		has_idea = shinto2
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1

		}

		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		}

			religion = vajrayana

		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana

		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6

		limit = {

		has_idea = shinto3
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = coptic
		has_idea = shinto4
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = coptic
		has_idea = shinto5
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = coptic
		has_idea = shinto6
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		add_idea = coptic6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = coptic
		has_idea = shinto7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		add_idea = coptic6
		add_idea = coptic7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Romuva
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = shinto1
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		}

		}

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = shinto2
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = shinto3
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = shinto4
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = shinto5
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = shinto6
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = shinto7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		add_idea = animist7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = shinto1
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = shinto2
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = shinto3
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = shinto4
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = shinto5
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = shinto6
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		add_idea = fetishist6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = shinto7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		add_idea = fetishist6
		add_idea = fetishist7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> zoroastrian
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = shinto1
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea = zoroastrian1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = shinto2
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea = zoroastrian1
		add_idea = zoroastrian2
		}

		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian

		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea = zoroastrian1
		add_idea = zoroastrian2
		add_idea = zoroastrian3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = shinto4
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea = zoroastrian1
		add_idea = zoroastrian2
		add_idea = zoroastrian3
		add_idea = zoroastrian4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = shinto5
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea = zoroastrian1
		add_idea = zoroastrian2
		add_idea = zoroastrian3
		add_idea = zoroastrian4
		add_idea = zoroastrian5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = shinto6
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea = zoroastrian1
		add_idea = zoroastrian2
		add_idea = zoroastrian3
		add_idea = zoroastrian4
		add_idea = zoroastrian5
		add_idea = zoroastrian6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = shinto7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea = zoroastrian1
		add_idea = zoroastrian2
		add_idea = zoroastrian3
		add_idea = zoroastrian4
		add_idea = zoroastrian5
		add_idea = zoroastrian6
		add_idea = zoroastrian7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Nahuatl

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		}
		
		if = {

		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = shinto2
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		}

		}

		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1

		add_idea = nahuatl3
		}

		has_idea = shinto4
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		add_idea = nahuatl3
		add_idea = nahuatl4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = shinto5
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		add_idea = nahuatl3
		add_idea = nahuatl4
		add_idea = nahuatl5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = shinto6
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		add_idea = nahuatl3
		add_idea = nahuatl4
		add_idea = nahuatl5
		add_idea = nahuatl6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = shinto7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		add_idea = nahuatl3
		add_idea = nahuatl4
		add_idea = nahuatl5
		add_idea = nahuatl6
		add_idea = nahuatl7
		}


		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Mesoamerican
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = shinto1
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = shinto2
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = shinto3
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = shinto4
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = shinto5
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = shinto6
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		add_idea = mesoamerican6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = shinto7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		add_idea = mesoamerican6
		add_idea = mesoamerican7
		}

######### shinto --> Shia
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {

		has_idea_group = shinto0
		NOT = { has_idea = shinto1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = shia0
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = shinto2 }
		}

		add_idea = shia1
		}

		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea = shia1
		add_idea = shia2
		add_idea = shia3
		add_idea = shia4
		add_idea = shia5
		add_idea = shia6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = shiite
		has_idea = shinto7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea = shia1
		add_idea = shia2
		add_idea = shia3
		add_idea = shia4
		add_idea = shia5
		add_idea = shia6
		add_idea = shia7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic

		}

		has_idea = cathar6

		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		add_idea = sunni3
		add_idea = sunni4
		add_idea = sunni5
		add_idea = sunni6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea = cathar7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		add_idea = sunni3
		add_idea = sunni4
		add_idea = sunni5
		add_idea = sunni6
		add_idea = sunni7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Hindu
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea_group = cathar0
		NOT = { has_idea = cathar1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = cathar1
		NOT = { has_idea = cathar2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}

		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		}

		add_idea = hindu5

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = cathar0
		NOT = { has_idea = cathar1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}

		NOT = { has_idea = cathar2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}

		}

		}

		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		}

		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = cathar0
		NOT = { has_idea = cathar1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = cathar2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		}

		religion = shiite
		has_idea = cathar6
		NOT = { has_idea = cathar7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea = shia1
		add_idea = shia2
		add_idea = shia3
		add_idea = shia4
		add_idea = shia5
		add_idea = shia6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = shiite

		}

		add_idea = shia3
		add_idea = shia4
		add_idea = shia5
		add_idea = shia6
		add_idea = shia7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = coptic0
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic

		NOT = { has_idea = coptic2 }
		}

		}

		add_idea = sunni4
		add_idea = sunni5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea = coptic6
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		add_idea = sunni3
		add_idea = sunni4
		add_idea = sunni5
		add_idea = sunni6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea = coptic7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		add_idea = sunni3
		add_idea = sunni4
		add_idea = sunni5
		add_idea = sunni6
		add_idea = sunni7
		}

		}

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = coptic0
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}

		NOT = { has_idea = coptic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}

		}

		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6

		NOT = { has_idea = coptic3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		}

		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = coptic1
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = coptic2
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = coptic4 }

		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = coptic4
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		}

		add_idea = animist2

		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5

		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		}

		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = animist0

		add_idea = animist2

		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		add_idea = animist7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = coptic0
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = coptic1
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = coptic2
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = coptic3
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = coptic4
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = coptic5
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = coptic6
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		add_idea = fetishist6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = coptic7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		add_idea = fetishist6
		add_idea = fetishist7

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Mesoamerican
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea_group = coptic0
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {

		NOT = { has_idea = coptic2 }
		}

		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		}

		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		}

		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		}

		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = coptic7 }
		}

		add_idea = mesoamerican3

		add_idea = mesoamerican6
		}

		}

		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3

		add_idea = shia4
		add_idea = shia5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = shiite
		has_idea = coptic6
		NOT = { has_idea = coptic7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea = shia1
		add_idea = shia2
		add_idea = shia3
		add_idea = shia4
		add_idea = shia5
		add_idea = shia6
		}

		add_idea = shia4
		add_idea = shia5

		add_idea = sunni2

		add_idea = sunni4
		}

		}

		remove_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		add_idea = cathar4
		add_idea = cathar5
		add_idea = cathar6
		add_idea = cathar7
		}

		add_idea = manichean4
		add_idea = manichean5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = romuva6
		NOT = { has_idea = romuva7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea = manichean1
		add_idea = manichean2
		add_idea = manichean3
		add_idea = manichean4
		add_idea = manichean5
		add_idea = manichean6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = romuva7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea = manichean1
		add_idea = manichean2
		add_idea = manichean3
		add_idea = manichean4
		add_idea = manichean5
		add_idea = manichean6
		add_idea = manichean7
		}

		add_idea = orthodox5
		add_idea = orthodox6

		}

		if = {

		has_idea_group = suomi0
		NOT = { has_idea = suomi1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = sunni0
		}

		has_idea = suomi4
		NOT = { has_idea = suomi5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		add_idea = cathar4
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = suomi4
		NOT = { has_idea = suomi5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea = manichean1
		add_idea = manichean2
		add_idea = manichean3
		add_idea = manichean4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = suomi5
		NOT = { has_idea = suomi6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea = manichean1
		add_idea = manichean2
		add_idea = manichean3
		add_idea = manichean4
		add_idea = manichean5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = suomi6
		NOT = { has_idea = suomi7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea = manichean1
		add_idea = manichean2
		add_idea = manichean3
		add_idea = manichean4
		add_idea = manichean5
		add_idea = manichean6
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {

		has_idea = suomi7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = suomi0

		add_idea = manichean2
		add_idea = manichean3
		add_idea = manichean4

		add_idea = manichean7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Animist
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea_group = suomi0
		NOT = { has_idea = suomi1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = suomi1
		NOT = { has_idea = suomi2 }
		}

		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		}

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = suomi0
		NOT = { has_idea = suomi1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = suomi1
		NOT = { has_idea = suomi2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		}

		OR = {

		}

		}
		remove_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea = totemist1
		add_idea = totemist2
		add_idea = totemist3
		add_idea = totemist4
		add_idea = totemist5
		add_idea = totemist6
		add_idea = totemist7
		}

######### suomi --> Shia

		remove_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea = orthodox1
		add_idea = orthodox2
		add_idea = orthodox3
		add_idea = orthodox4
		add_idea = orthodox5
		add_idea = orthodox6
		add_idea = orthodox7
		}

		limit = {
		religion  = cathar
		has_idea = jewish4
		NOT = { has_idea = jewish5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		add_idea = cathar4
		}

		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = jewish4
		NOT = { has_idea = jewish5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea = manichean1
		add_idea = manichean2
		add_idea = manichean3
		add_idea = manichean4
		}

		remove_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea = totemist1
		add_idea = totemist2
		add_idea = totemist3
		add_idea = totemist4
		add_idea = totemist5
		add_idea = totemist6
		add_idea = totemist7
		}

		add_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea = orthodox1
		add_idea = orthodox2
		add_idea = orthodox3
		add_idea = orthodox4
		add_idea = orthodox5
		add_idea = orthodox6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = orthodox
		has_idea = slavic7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea_group = orthodox0
		add_idea = orthodox1
		add_idea = orthodox2
		add_idea = orthodox3
		add_idea = orthodox4
		add_idea = orthodox5
		add_idea = orthodox6
		add_idea = orthodox7
		}

######### Protestant --> Islam

		}

		add_idea_group = sunni0
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = slavic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = cathar
		has_idea = slavic2

		}
		remove_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea_group = cathar0

		}

######### Protestant --> Romuva

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea_group = slavic0
		NOT = { has_idea = slavic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		}

			religion = romuva

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Manechism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea_group = slavic0
		NOT = { has_idea = slavic1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea_group = manichean0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea = slavic1
		NOT = { has_idea = slavic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea = manichean1
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Animist

		if = {

		NOT = { has_idea = slavic1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = animist0
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus

		if = {
		limit = {

			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan

		NOT = { has_idea = slavic1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = hellenic0
		NOT = { has_idea = hellenic1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = catholic0
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = hellenic2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hellenic0

		add_idea = orthodox1
		}

		add_idea_group = sunni0
		}

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}

		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}

		add_idea = hellenic1

		add_idea = hellenic3
		add_idea = hellenic4
		add_idea = hellenic5
		add_idea = hellenic6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = hellenic
			religion = hellenic_pagan
			}
		has_idea = hellenic7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = hellenic0
		add_idea_group = hellenic0
		add_idea = hellenic1
		add_idea = hellenic2
		add_idea = hellenic3
		add_idea = hellenic4
		add_idea = hellenic5
		add_idea = hellenic6
		add_idea = hellenic7
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = hellenic2 }

		}

		remove_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		add_idea = shinto2
		add_idea = shinto3
		}

		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = manichean4
		NOT = { has_idea = manichean5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		add_idea = shinto2

		add_idea = shinto4

		if = {
		limit = {

			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea_group = manichean0
		NOT = { has_idea = manichean1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		}

			religion = romuva
			}

		NOT = { has_idea = manichean2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		}

		remove_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea_group = hellenic0
		add_idea = hellenic1
		add_idea = hellenic2
		add_idea = hellenic3
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = hellenic
			religion = hellenic_pagan
			}
		has_idea = manichean4
		NOT = { has_idea = manichean5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea_group = hellenic0
		add_idea = hellenic1
		add_idea = hellenic2
		add_idea = hellenic3
		add_idea = hellenic4

		OR = {

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Manechism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}
		has_idea_group = manichean0
		NOT = { has_idea = manichean1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea_group = manichean0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = manichean
			religion = manichaeism
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = manichean2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea = manichean1
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Animist
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea_group = manichean0
		NOT = { has_idea = manichean1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = manichean1
		NOT = { has_idea = manichean2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		}

		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = manichean2
		NOT = { has_idea = manichean3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = manichean0

		add_idea = animist2
		}

		add_idea_group = animist0

		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		}

		add_idea = animist3

		add_idea = animist5
		}

		add_idea = animist5

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = manichean0
		NOT = { has_idea = manichean1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = manichean1
		NOT = { has_idea = manichean2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = manichean0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		}

			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan

		NOT = { has_idea = manichean3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = manichean0

		add_idea = fetishist2
		}

		}

		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan

		has_idea = manichean5
		NOT = { has_idea = manichean6 }

		}

		add_idea = mesoamerican5

		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = animist7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		add_idea = norse7
		}

		}

		}

			religion_group = hellenic
			religion = hellenic_pagan
			}
		has_idea = animist1
		NOT = { has_idea = animist2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = hellenic0
		add_idea = hellenic1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = hellenic
			religion = hellenic_pagan
			}
		has_idea = animist2
		NOT = { has_idea = animist3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = hellenic0
		add_idea = hellenic1
		add_idea = hellenic2
		}

		limit = {

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = animist0
		NOT = { has_idea = animist1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}

			religion_group = african_pagan

		NOT = { has_idea = animist2 }

##################################################

		if = {

		NOT = { has_idea = fetishist3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea_group = anglican0
		add_idea = anglican1
		add_idea = anglican2
		}

		limit = {

		NOT = { has_idea = fetishist6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		}

		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed

		NOT = { has_idea = fetishist7 }

		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3

		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		}

		}

		add_idea = norse5

		NOT = { has_idea = fetishist7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		add_idea = slavic5
		add_idea = slavic6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = fetishist7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		add_idea = slavic5
		add_idea = slavic6
		add_idea = slavic7
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = fetishist7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		add_idea = mesoamerican6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = fetishist7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		add_idea = mesoamerican6
		add_idea = mesoamerican7
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = reformed0
		add_idea = reformed1
		add_idea = reformed2
		add_idea = reformed3
		add_idea = reformed4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = reformed
		has_idea = zoroastrian5
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = reformed0
		add_idea = reformed1
		add_idea = reformed2
		add_idea = reformed3
		add_idea = reformed4
		add_idea = reformed5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = reformed
		has_idea = zoroastrian6
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = reformed0
		add_idea = reformed1
		add_idea = reformed2
		add_idea = reformed3
		add_idea = reformed4
		add_idea = reformed5
		add_idea = reformed6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = reformed
		has_idea = zoroastrian7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = reformed0
		add_idea = reformed1
		add_idea = reformed2
		add_idea = reformed3
		add_idea = reformed4
		add_idea = reformed5
		add_idea = reformed6
		add_idea = reformed7

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Islam
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea = zoroastrian1
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea = zoroastrian2
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea = zoroastrian3
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		add_idea = sunni3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea = zoroastrian4
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		add_idea = sunni3
		add_idea = sunni4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea = zoroastrian5
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		add_idea = sunni3
		add_idea = sunni4
		add_idea = sunni5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea = zoroastrian6
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		add_idea = sunni3
		add_idea = sunni4
		add_idea = sunni5
		add_idea = sunni6
		}

		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea = zoroastrian7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		add_idea = sunni3
		add_idea = sunni4
		add_idea = sunni5
		add_idea = sunni6
		add_idea = sunni7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Tengri
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = zoroastrian1
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = zoroastrian2
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		}

		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed

		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian4 }

		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3

		if = {

		}

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = zoroastrian1
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}

		add_idea = confucian7

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = zoroastrian1
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = zoroastrian2
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = zoroastrian3
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = zoroastrian4
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = zoroastrian5
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = zoroastrian6
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = zoroastrian7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		add_idea = buddhism7
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea = zoroastrian7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		add_idea = jewish5
		add_idea = jewish6
		add_idea = jewish7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Slav
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = zoroastrian1
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = zoroastrian2
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0

		add_idea = slavic2
		}

			religion = slavic

		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian4 }

		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		}

		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = zoroastrian4
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian5 }
		}

		add_idea_group = slavic0
		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = zoroastrian5
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian6 }

		add_idea = slavic1
		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4
		add_idea = slavic5

		limit = {

			religion = slavic
			}
		has_idea = zoroastrian6
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian7 }
		}

		add_idea_group = slavic0

		add_idea = slavic2
		add_idea = slavic3
		add_idea = slavic4

		add_idea = slavic6

		}

		add_idea_group = manichean0
		}

		}

		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = zoroastrian5
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		add_idea = nahuatl3
		add_idea = nahuatl4
		add_idea = nahuatl5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = zoroastrian6
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		add_idea = nahuatl3
		add_idea = nahuatl4
		add_idea = nahuatl5
		add_idea = nahuatl6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = nahuatl
		has_idea = zoroastrian7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea = nahuatl1
		add_idea = nahuatl2
		add_idea = nahuatl3
		add_idea = nahuatl4
		add_idea = nahuatl5
		add_idea = nahuatl6
		add_idea = nahuatl7
		}


		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Mesoamerican
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = zoroastrian1
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = zoroastrian2
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = zoroastrian3
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = zoroastrian4
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = zoroastrian5
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = zoroastrian6
		NOT = { has_idea = zoroastrian7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		add_idea = mesoamerican6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = zoroastrian7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = anglican0
		NOT = { has_idea = anglican1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = anglican0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = anglican2 }
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Protestant 
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant
		has_idea_group = anglican0
		NOT = { has_idea = anglican1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = anglican0
		add_idea_group = protestant0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = protestant

		}

		add_idea = confucian3

		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = anglican7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = anglican0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		add_idea = confucian7
		}

			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana

		NOT = { has_idea = anglican1 }

			}
		has_idea = anglican7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = anglican0
		add_idea_group = suomi0
		add_idea = suomi1
		add_idea = suomi2
		add_idea = suomi3
		add_idea = suomi4
		add_idea = suomi5
		add_idea = suomi6
		add_idea = suomi7
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea_group = anglican0
		NOT = { has_idea = anglican1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = jewish0

		add_idea = zoroastrian2
		add_idea = zoroastrian3
		add_idea = zoroastrian4
		add_idea = zoroastrian5
		add_idea = zoroastrian6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = anglican7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = anglican0
		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea = zoroastrian1
		add_idea = zoroastrian2
		add_idea = zoroastrian3
		add_idea = zoroastrian4
		add_idea = zoroastrian5
		add_idea = zoroastrian6
		add_idea = zoroastrian7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {

		has_idea_group = nahuatl0
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = catholic0
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic

		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl3 }
		}

		add_idea_group = catholic0
		add_idea = catholic1
		add_idea = catholic2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = nahuatl3
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0

		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = nahuatl2
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		}

		}

		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = nahuatl0
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = nahuatl1
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = nahuatl2
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = nahuatl3
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = nahuatl4
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = nahuatl5
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		}

		OR = {

			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = nahuatl6
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		}

		OR = {

			}

		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0

		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2

		if = {

		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = norse0
		}

		religion = norse_pagan_reformed

		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl2 }

######### Protestant --> Shinto
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea_group = nahuatl0
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = shinto
		has_idea = nahuatl1
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = shinto0
		add_idea = shinto1
		}

		add_idea = shinto1

		}

		add_idea_group = shinto0

		}

######### Protestant --> Jewish
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea_group = nahuatl0
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		}

		limit = {

		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl2 }

		add_idea = jewish1
		}

######### Protestant --> Fetishismus

		if = {

		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}

		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = nahuatl1
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea = zoroastrian1
		}

######### Protestant --> Nahuatl
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {

		has_idea_group = nahuatl0
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = nahuatl0
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl2 }
		}

		}

		add_idea = nahuatl5
		add_idea = nahuatl6

		add_idea = nahuatl5
		add_idea = nahuatl6
		add_idea = nahuatl7
		}


		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Mesoamerican
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea_group = nahuatl0
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = nahuatl1
		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		}

		}

		}

		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl6 }

		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5

		NOT = { has_idea = nahuatl7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea = hussite1
		add_idea = hussite2
		add_idea = hussite3
		add_idea = hussite4
		add_idea = hussite5
		add_idea = hussite6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = hussite
		has_idea = nahuatl7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = nahuatl0
		add_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea = hussite1
		add_idea = hussite2
		add_idea = hussite3
		add_idea = hussite4
		add_idea = hussite5
		add_idea = hussite6
		add_idea = hussite7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		}

		}

		}

		}

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}

		limit = {

		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican2 }

		}

		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = mesoamerican3
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = mesoamerican4
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = mesoamerican5
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = mesoamerican6
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = mesoamerican7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		add_idea = hindu7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Confucianism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		}

		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = mesoamerican1
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		}

		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0

		add_idea = confucian2
		}

		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3

		add_idea = confucian2

		add_idea = confucian5
