##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican1
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican2
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican3
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican4
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican5
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican6
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		add_idea = buddhism7
		}

######### Protestant --> Nordisch
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = mesoamerican1
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		}

		religion = norse_pagan_reformed

		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0

		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		}

		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = mesoamerican4
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = norse0
		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican6 }

		add_idea = norse1
		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		}
		
		if = {

		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican7 }
		}

		add_idea = norse2
		add_idea = norse3
		add_idea = norse4
		add_idea = norse5
		add_idea = norse6
		}

		}

		}

		add_idea_group = cathar0
		add_idea = cathar1
		}

		add_idea = cathar4
		add_idea = cathar5
		}

		add_idea_group = cathar0

		add_idea = cathar2
		add_idea = cathar3
		add_idea = cathar4
		add_idea = cathar5
		add_idea = cathar6
		}

######### Protestant --> Romuva

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican1
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		}

			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican2
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		}

			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican3
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican4 }

		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		}

		OR = {

			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican4
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		add_idea = romuva4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican5
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		add_idea = romuva4
		add_idea = romuva5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican6
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		add_idea = romuva4
		add_idea = romuva5
		add_idea = romuva6
		}

		OR = {

			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = mesoamerican7
		
		}

		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3

		add_idea = romuva5
		add_idea = romuva6
		add_idea = romuva7
		}

######### Protestant --> Jewish

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group
		has_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = jewish0
		}

		limit = {
		religion_group = jewish_group

		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican2 }
		}

		}

		}

		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican5 }
		}

		add_idea_group = jewish0
		add_idea = jewish1
		add_idea = jewish2
		add_idea = jewish3
		add_idea = jewish4
		}

		add_idea = jewish3

		add_idea = jewish2

		add_idea = jewish4
		add_idea = jewish5
		add_idea = jewish6
		}

		}

		add_idea = jewish5
		add_idea = jewish6

		if = {

		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = manichean0
		}

			religion = manichaeism

		add_idea = animist6
		}

		}

		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = mesoamerican1
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = mesoamerican2
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = mesoamerican3
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = mesoamerican4
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican5 }

		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = mesoamerican5
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = mesoamerican6
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican7 }

		OR = {

		has_idea = mesoamerican7
		
		}

		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3

		add_idea = fetishist5
		add_idea = fetishist6
		add_idea = fetishist7

##################################################
######### Protestant --> zoroastrian
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		}

		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = mesoamerican1
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea = zoroastrian1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = zoroastrian 
		has_idea = mesoamerican2
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican3 }

		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0

		}

		add_idea = zoroastrian2

		add_idea = zoroastrian4

		}

		add_idea = zoroastrian3
		add_idea = zoroastrian4
		add_idea = zoroastrian5
		add_idea = zoroastrian6
		}

		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = zoroastrian0
		add_idea = zoroastrian1
		add_idea = zoroastrian2
		add_idea = zoroastrian3
		add_idea = zoroastrian4
		add_idea = zoroastrian5
		add_idea = zoroastrian6
		add_idea = zoroastrian7

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Mesoamerican
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = mesoamerican1
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = mesoamerican2
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = mesoamerican3
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = mesoamerican4
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = mesoamerican5
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = mesoamerican6
		NOT = { has_idea = mesoamerican7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5
		add_idea = mesoamerican6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = mesoamerican_religion
		has_idea = mesoamerican7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea_group = mesoamerican0
		add_idea = mesoamerican1
		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3
		add_idea = mesoamerican4
		add_idea = mesoamerican5

		}

		has_idea = inti7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = inti0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		add_idea = coptic6
		add_idea = coptic7
		}

		remove_idea_group = inti0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = inti7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = inti0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6

		}

##################################################
######### Protestant ---> catholic

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = totemist0
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist1 }
		}

		}

		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = totemist1
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = totemist2
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = totemist3
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = totemist4
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = totemist5
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = totemist6
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist7 }

		remove_idea_group = totemist0

		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		add_idea = tengri6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_idea = totemist7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = tengri0

		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		add_idea = tengri5
		add_idea = tengri6
		add_idea = tengri7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Hindu
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea_group = totemist0
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = totemist1
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = totemist2
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = totemist3
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = totemist4
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = totemist5
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = totemist6
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = totemist7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		add_idea = hindu7
		}

		
##################################################
######### Protestant --> Confucianism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea_group = totemist0
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = totemist1
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = totemist2
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		}

		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism

		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1

		add_idea = confucian3
		}

		religion  = confucianism

		NOT = { has_idea = totemist5 }
		}

		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = totemist5
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = totemist6
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		}

		limit = {
		religion  = confucianism
		has_idea = totemist7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = confucian0
		add_idea = confucian1
		add_idea = confucian2
		add_idea = confucian3
		add_idea = confucian4
		add_idea = confucian5
		add_idea = confucian6
		add_idea = confucian7
		}

##################################################
######### Protestant --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = totemist0
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = totemist1
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = totemist2
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = totemist3
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = totemist4
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = totemist5
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = totemist6
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = totemist7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		add_idea = buddhism7
		}

		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = coptic
		has_idea = totemist5
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = coptic
		has_idea = totemist6
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		add_idea = coptic6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion  = coptic
		has_idea = totemist7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = coptic0
		add_idea = coptic1
		add_idea = coptic2
		add_idea = coptic3
		add_idea = coptic4
		add_idea = coptic5
		add_idea = coptic6
		add_idea = coptic7
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = totemist3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = totemist3
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = totemist4
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		}

		has_idea = totemist5
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist6 }

		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = totemist7 }

		add_idea = animist2

		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = animism
		has_idea = totemist7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = animist0
		add_idea = animist1
		add_idea = animist2
		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		add_idea = animist7
		}


##################################################
######### Protestant --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = totemist0
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = totemist1
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = totemist2
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = totemist3
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = totemist4
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = totemist5
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = totemist6
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		add_idea = fetishist6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = totemist7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		add_idea = fetishist5
		add_idea = fetishist6
		add_idea = fetishist7
		}

		if = {

		NOT = { has_idea = totemist1 }

		}

		}

		add_idea = mesoamerican2

		add_idea = mesoamerican5

		add_idea = shia1
		add_idea = shia2
		add_idea = shia3
		add_idea = shia4
		add_idea = shia5
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = shiite
		has_idea = totemist6
		NOT = { has_idea = totemist7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = totemist0
		add_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea = shia1
		add_idea = shia2
		add_idea = shia3
		add_idea = shia4
		add_idea = shia5
		add_idea = shia6
		}

		religion = shiite

		}

		add_idea = shia2
		add_idea = shia3
		add_idea = shia4
		add_idea = shia5
		add_idea = shia6

##################################################
######### Shia ---> catholic
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = catholic
		has_idea_group = shia0
		NOT = { has_idea = shia1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea_group = catholic0
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = shia2 }

		add_idea = catholic1
		}

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = sunni
		has_idea = shia5
		NOT = { has_idea = shia6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = shia0
		add_idea_group = sunni0
		add_idea = sunni1
		add_idea = sunni2
		add_idea = sunni3

		limit = {
		religion  = coptic

##################################################

		if = {

		has_idea_group = shia0
		NOT = { has_idea = shia1 }

		}

##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {

			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = shia1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = ibadi5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea_group = tengri0
		add_idea = tengri1
		add_idea = tengri2
		add_idea = tengri3
		add_idea = tengri4
		}

		add_idea_group = hindu0
		}

			}

		NOT = { has_idea = ibadi1 }
		}

		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}

			}

		add_idea = animist3
		add_idea = animist4
		add_idea = animist5
		add_idea = animist6
		add_idea = animist7
		}


##################################################
######### ibadi --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = ibadi0
		NOT = { has_idea = ibadi1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = ibadi1
		NOT = { has_idea = ibadi2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = ibadi2
		NOT = { has_idea = ibadi3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		}

			religion = shamanism

		}
		has_idea = ibadi3
		NOT = { has_idea = ibadi4 }

		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		}

		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = ibadi4
		NOT = { has_idea = ibadi5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = ibadi5
		NOT = { has_idea = ibadi6 }

		NOT = { has_idea = ibadi5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea = hussite1
		add_idea = hussite2
		add_idea = hussite3
		add_idea = hussite4
		}

		has_idea = hussite1
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = hussite2
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = hussite3

		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		}

		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		}

		limit = {

		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3

		add_idea = hindu5
		}

		has_idea = hussite6
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = hindu0
		add_idea = hindu1
		add_idea = hindu2
		add_idea = hindu3
		add_idea = hindu4
		add_idea = hindu5
		add_idea = hindu6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion_group  = dharmic
		has_idea = hussite7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = hindu0

		add_idea = hindu2

		add_idea = hindu5

		if = {

		NOT = { has_idea = hussite1 }

		}

##################################################
######### hussite --> Buddhism
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea_group = hussite0
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hussite1
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite2 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hussite2
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hussite3
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite4 }
		}

		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		}

		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hussite4
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite5 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hussite5
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite6 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hussite6
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2
		add_idea = buddhism3
		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = buddhism
			religion = vajrayana
			religion = mahayana
			}
		has_idea = hussite7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = buddhism0
		add_idea = buddhism1
		add_idea = buddhism2

		add_idea = buddhism4
		add_idea = buddhism5
		add_idea = buddhism6
		add_idea = buddhism7

		if = {

		}

		}

		if = {
		limit = {

			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea_group = hussite0
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		}

		}

		add_idea = romuva1
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = hussite5 }

		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = romuva0
		add_idea = romuva1
		add_idea = romuva2
		add_idea = romuva3
		add_idea = romuva4
		}

		limit = {

			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
			religion = romuva
			}
		has_idea = hussite5
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite6 }

##################################################
######### hussite --> Fetishismus
##################################################

		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea_group = hussite0
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite1 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = hussite2 }

		add_idea = fetishist1
		}

		NOT = { has_idea = hussite3 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = hussite3
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite4 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		}

		limit = {
		OR = {
			religion = shamanism 
			religion_group = african_pagan 
		}
		has_idea = hussite4
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite5 }

		add_idea_group = fetishist0
		add_idea = fetishist1
		add_idea = fetishist2
		add_idea = fetishist3
		add_idea = fetishist4
		}

		OR = {
			religion = shamanism

		has_idea = hussite5

		add_idea = mesoamerican2
		add_idea = mesoamerican3

		add_idea = mesoamerican5

		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = ibadi
		has_idea = hussite6
		NOT = { has_idea = hussite7 }
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea = ibadi1
		add_idea = ibadi2
		add_idea = ibadi3
		add_idea = ibadi4
		add_idea = ibadi5
		add_idea = ibadi6
		}
		
		if = {
		limit = {
		religion = ibadi
		has_idea = hussite7
		
		}
		remove_idea_group = hussite0
		add_idea_group = ibadi0
		add_idea = ibadi1
		add_idea = ibadi2
		add_idea = ibadi3
		add_idea = ibadi4
		add_idea = ibadi5
		add_idea = ibadi6
		add_idea = ibadi7
		}


	


}    # End of Command
